synopsis.text: Set in Neo Domino City in the future after the legendary Yugi Mutou, Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's introduces Riding Duels - a new form of dueling played on advanced motorbikes called D-Wheels. The story follows Yusei Fudo, a skilled mechanic living in the impoverished Satellite sector of the city. His former friend Jack Atlas betrayed him, stealing his D-Wheel and ace monster Stardust Dragon before escaping to the affluent Neo Domino. Now determined to get revenge and reclaim what is rightfully his, Yusei builds a new D-Wheel and sets off to challenge Jack, the reigning King of Riding Duels. But there are mysterious forces at play as Yusei soon discovers his destiny as a "Signer", one of a group of duelists marked by the Crimson Dragon. Together with his friends, he finds himself at the center of dark events threatening Neo Domino and must duel not only to settle scores but to save the future of dueling itself.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
